thread.title: BRIEF-Acxiom Announces Q3 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.28

title: BRIEF-Acxiom Announces Q3 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.28
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Acxiom Corp:
* ACXIOM ANNOUNCES THIRD QUARTER RESULTS * Q3 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.31 * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.85 TO $0.89 * SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.19 TO $0.23 * Q3 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.28 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP ABOUT 6 PERCENT * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $910 MILLION TO $915 MILLION * Q3 REVENUE ROSE 5 PERCENT TO $235 MILLION * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.24, REVENUE VIEW $238.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.83, REVENUE VIEW $922.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
